message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price of $180. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I can meet you halfway at $165. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Can you consider that?
I can see you're serious about the product, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $140. I can offer you a compromise at $155. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Can you meet me at $145?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal! I can meet you at $150, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $145. Can you meet me there?

I'm starting to think you're not serious about buying the product at a fair price. I'm going to stick to my previous offer of $150, and that's my final counteroffer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
